revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Energy Plant |image = [[File:Energy Plant.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Energy Plant. |tokens = 1,850,000 |location = In Hammerlocke }}
<!--T:2--> '''Energy Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 26,704,124 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Steelix.png|40px]] Steelix || rowspan=8 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] Mawile |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong |- | [[File:Durant.png|40px]] Durant |- | [[File:Bisharp.png|40px]] Bisharp |- | [[File:Doublade.png|40px]] Doublade |- | [[File:Golisopod.png|40px]] Golisopod |- | [[File:Galarian Stunfisk.png|40px]] Galarian Stunfisk |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2| [[File:Zacian (Battle Hero).png|50px]] '''Zacian (Battle Hero)*''' || rowspan=5| <center>169,578,810 || rowspan=5|[[File:Macro Cosmos (rose).png|40px]] Macro Cosmos Rose || [[File:Escavalier.png|40px]] Escavalier || rowspan=5|<center> 26,704,124 |- | [[File:Ferrothorn.png|40px]] Ferrothorn |- | rowspan=3| [[File:Zamazenta (Battle Hero).png|50px]] '''Zamazenta (Battle Hero)*''' || [[File:Perrserker.png|40px]] Perrserker |- | [[File:Klinklang.png|40px]] Klinklang |- | [[File:Gigantamax Copperajah.png|40px]] Gigantamax Copperajah |}
'''*Note:''' Unlocks as part of [[Questlines#Sword and Shield|Sword and Shield]] Questline.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || N/A || 26.31% || 25.81% || 23.54% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 26.31% || 25.81% || 23.54% |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 26.31% || 25.81% || 23.54% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |}
<!--T:9--> {{Galar Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #8 - Galar^a]] </translate>
